meanings.definition: A round fruit with red or green skin and white flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating juicy appels for a snack.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sells fresh appels in the produce section.
meanings.sent3: The teacher used colorful appels to teach us about healthy eating.
meanings.sent4: The basket of appels on the table looked like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of ripe appels filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To make a formal request for something.
meanings.sent1: I will appels the principal for permission to organize a school event.
meanings.sent2: She decided to appels her boss for a day off.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly appels for a lifetime supply of chocolate.
meanings.sent4: She appels the universe for a chance to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The knight appels the king for assistance in defeating the dragon.

meanings.definition: A device or piece of software designed for a specific purpose or function.
meanings.sent1: The new appels helps users track their daily exercise.
meanings.sent2: The appels on my phone reminds me of important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The tiny appels on the watch can measure heart rate.
meanings.sent4: The appels in the car assists with navigation.
